oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The effect of municipal waste composts on grass nutrient yields
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tontti, Tiina
Lehtonen, Keijo
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Field experiments with grass mixtures (Phleum pratense, Festuca pratensis) were established with a cereal cover crop (Hordeum vulgare) and fertilized with municipal waste composts on medium fine sand in Mikkeli in 2000.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Tontti, Tiina and Lehtonen, Keijo (2003) The effect of municipal waste composts on grass nutrient yields. Paper at: Nordic agriculture in global perspective: NJF's 22nd congress, Turku, Finland, July 1-4, 2003.
